General.Name: Fu Chun Shin Machinery Manufacture Co Ltd
General.Description: Fu Chun Shin Machinery Manufacture Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of injection molding machines in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers various single injection products, such as all-electric, hydraulic, servo power-saving, two-platen, outward toggle, high-speed/closed-loop hybrid, and pet preform injection molding machines. Its multi-injection products include rotary table and shaft two-component, sandwich/interval, and horizontal rotary table two-component injection molding machines. In addition, the company provides special materials, including thermosetting, BMC, PVC pipe, and PET perform injection molding machines. Further, it offers mold labeling turnkey, beverage packaging, high precision injection mold, and turnkey solution services, as well as remote monitoring systems, intelligent manufactory, and gas assisted and foaming injection molding systems. Its products are used in medical appliances, auto parts, packaging products, electronic products, optical elements, housewares, and building components. The company was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in Tainan, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 269, Baodong Road, Tainan City, Taiwan
